subject: Football
lead_paragraph: When the Super Bowl III champions are honored at Sunday’s Jets-Chiefs game, Joe Namath will surely get the loudest cheers, but Larry Grantham deserves just as many decibels.
snippet: When the Super Bowl III champions are honored at Sunday’s Jets-Chiefs game, Joe Namath will surely get the loudest cheers, but Larry Grantham deserves just as many decibels.
